name: Solitaired - Classic solitaire games
description:
Solitaire is one of the oldest and most popular games. We couldn't find a version with beautiful graphics and easy game play, so we created Solitaired. With the game, you can:

  • Play unlimited games
  • Play a game of the day
  • Undo moves and get hints to help you win
  • Customize your cards
  • Play turn 1 and turn 3 solitaire

You can also play solitaire online and learn how to play here.
